Occupation History:
Moreau Fournier is a 59 year old CEO from France.
Moreau Fournier began his professional journey as a Hotel Manager at Hilton Worldwide France in 1989, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of General Manager at InterContinental Hotels Group France in 1991, further expanding his skill set.
At Hilton Worldwide France, he worked as a Regional Vice President from 1994 to 1998, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
In 1999, he transitioned to Accor S.A. to take on the position of CEO, capitalizing on his expertise to propel business growth.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 1350000 EUR.
He owns villa in Angers, where he resides. It is worth 2760000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns house in Le Havre worth 2170000 EUR.

In 2007, he received an inheritance of 3240000 EUR from his late grandfather, who was a prominent Investment Banker, and has since invested it in various assets.
